.. _`cs-web-components-base-formcontrols.Password.__module__`:

========
Password
========

.. contents:: Local Navigation
   :local:
   :depth: 2

Description
===========



This component can be used to enter password. The user inputs would be masked. It takes such
properties just as the <:ref:`cs-web-components-base-formcontrols.TextInput.__default__`>.
